page.title: 10 OLD AIRPORT
page.content: At L'Eree there is a large field where there was an{airport}before World War 2.There was no tarmac, only grass. There were no runway lights and they just landed on the grass. Double winged planes called{Rapides}used the airport. They could either go to England or Alderney. If they wanted to go anywhere else they would have to take a{flying boat}. Mr.Best,the owner, asked the Island Development Committee if he could have some shelter for his sheep but the I.D.C. said no because they thought it would look untidy.So there is no shelter for his sheep. The sheep are in the large field with wire around it. Mr Best holds Showjumping events in the field in the summer. In the winter the field gets flooded. { { }By{Nigel Gill {
